name: GameboyRPGPresentationDemo
description:
This is a demo for the RPG I've been working on the past 3 or so months.

  Features:
-Multiple RPG Battles with a robust system!
-Puzzling puzzles in the Dungeon!
-Wow, I'm bad at advertising! Good thing I'm not in that industry!
-Various text-formatting issues (maybe) as a free BONUS!

(Seriously, if you spot any issues - please leave a comment below. Your feedback is paramount to continued development).


Chances are you probably don't care, but here's a list of the bugs I encountered during development, and how I fixed them
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JWOMWqNPuQ2HEfoAPeRcAGeJRmhziILVTfXsGZym...
